column4: Ok, i'm a new one to Ubuntu, i'm going going to install it on a laptop that was running FC6 pre 1, anything i need to know, or just plain install?
if you're experienced with FC, Ubuntu will not be a huge shock
it has something like apt-get called apt-get
it's the live cd, i just downloaded, so it should have mounted them
try unmounting filesystems before altering them
: need to reboot it bow... it's stuck at 15% "detecting file system"
the alternate CD has the curse installer
be sure to enable the Universe and Multiverse repos
